segment.source: Install apps on your Microsoft Surface Hub
segment.target: Install apps on your Microsoft Surface Hub

segment.source: Admins can install apps can from either the Windows Store or the Windows Store for Business.
segment.target: Admins can install apps can from either the Windows Store or the Windows Store for Business.

segment.source: Install apps on your Microsoft Surface Hub
segment.target: Install apps on your Microsoft Surface Hub

segment.source: Admins can install apps can from either the Windows Store or the Windows Store for Business.
segment.target: Admins can install apps can from either the Windows Store or the Windows Store for Business.

segment.source: Admins can install apps on the device using the Windows Store app available in SettingsSystemMicrosoft Surface Hub.
segment.target: Admins can install apps on the device using the Windows Store app available in SettingsSystemMicrosoft Surface Hub.

segment.source: They can start the store app, sign in using their Microsoft account credentials, browse, purchase, and install the apps as with any other Windows device.
segment.target: They can start the store app, sign in using their Microsoft account credentials, browse, purchase, and install the apps as with any other Windows device.

segment.source: For apps purchased through the Store for Business, download the Appxbundle, offline license, and the dependencies for the App from the store to a separate PC.
segment.target: For apps purchased through the Store for Business, download the Appxbundle, offline license, and the dependencies for the App from the store to a separate PC.

segment.source: Create a provisioning package and copy it to a USB drive.
segment.target: Create a provisioning package and copy it to a USB drive.

segment.source: (See Create a provisioning package.) Move the USB drive to the Surface Hub, and install the app on the device using the Settings app.
segment.target: (See Create a provisioning package.) Move the USB drive to the Surface Hub, and install the app on the device using the Settings app.
